meanings.sent1: The ice cream on a hot day was ultracool.
meanings.sent2: The new superhero movie was ultracool.
meanings.sent3: The penguin thought wearing sunglasses was ultracool.
meanings.sent4: Her calm demeanor in a crisis was as ultracool as a cucumber.
meanings.sent5: The ultracool guitar solo left the audience in awe.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is very fashionable or trendy.
meanings.sent1: The celebrity was known as the ultracool of the town.
meanings.sent2: The latest smartphone became the ultracool among students.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought wearing a bowtie made it ultracool.
meanings.sent4: The ultracool fashionista turned heads wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The ultracool sports car was the envy of the neighborhood.
